00018 #ifndef _CRGUNITTYPE_H
00019 #define _CRGUNITTYPE_H
00020

00023 #include "mol_and_orb.h"
00024 #include "orbitals.h"
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <stdexcept>
00027 
00028 namespace votca { namespace moo {
00029 
00030 class CrgUnit;
00031 
00041 class CrgUnitType
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     
00045     // initialised by a list of ID names, molecule specifications
00046     // and orbital specifications
00047     
00048    ~CrgUnitType();
00049        
00050     const vector <unsigned int>& GetTransOrbs() const;
00051     
00052     const unsigned int & getId() const { return _id; }
00053     
00054     string & GetMolName();   
00055     
00056     const string & GetName() const { return _name; }
00057     
00058     // TODO: mol_and_orb should not be in the interface!
00059     mol_and_orb & GetCrgUnit();
00060 
00061     // TODO: orb should not be in the interface!
00062     const orb & GetOrb() const;
00063 
00064     basis_set & GetBS(){ return _bs; }
00065 
00066     Property *getOptions() { return _options; }
00067     void setOptions(Property *options) { _options = options; }
00068 
00069 private:
00070 
00071     basis_set               _bs;
00072     mol_and_orb             _intcoords;
00073     orb                     _orbitals;
00074     Property               *_options;
00075     vector <unsigned int>   _transorbs;
00076     unsigned int            _id;
00077 
00079     string                  _name;
00080     // a list of atoms in the same bead of which atoms correspond to which bead
00081     vector <vector <int> >  _list_atoms_monomer;
00082 
00083     // a list of centre of mass of the monomer
00084     vector < vec  >         _list_coms_monomer;
00085 
00086     // a list of rotation matrices to project the internal
00087     // coordinates of each monomer onto the reference state
00088     vector < matrix >       _list_ors_monomer;
00089 
00090     // this will take each bead and move it to positions[i] rotating by the
00091     // orientation corresponding to norm and rotate we assume that the pointer
00092     // is to a suitable molecule...
00093     void rotate_each_bead(vector < vec >::iterator it_pos,
00094                           vector < vec >::iterator it_norm,
00095                           vector <vec >::iterator it_plan,
00096                           mol_and_orb * rotated_molecule );
00097 
00098     // can only be created by JCalc
00099     CrgUnitType(): _id(-1) {};
00100     
00101     // can only be created by JCalc
00102     CrgUnitType(const char * namecoord,
00103                 const char * nameorb,
00104                 const char * nameneutr,
00105                 const char * namecrg,
00106                 string & basisset,
00107                 const vector < int>& transorbs,
00108                 const unsigned int &id,
00109                 string name,
00110                 vector < vector < int > > list_atoms_monomer,
00111                 vector < vector < double > > list_weights_monomer);
00112 
00113     friend class CrgUnit;
00114     friend class JCalc;
00115 };
00116 
00117 inline const vector <unsigned int>& CrgUnitType::GetTransOrbs() const{
00118     return _transorbs;
00119 }
00120 
00121 inline mol_and_orb & CrgUnitType::GetCrgUnit() {
00122     return _intcoords;
00123 }
00124 
00125 inline const orb & CrgUnitType::GetOrb() const {
00126     return _orbitals;
00127 }
00128 
00129 }}
